message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method for generating realistic clothing deformation from real data capture using a combination of subspace modeling and conditional Generative Adversarial Network. The paper involves computer graphics (cs.GR) as it deals with rendering of clothing deformation sequences. It also involves computer vision (cs.CV) as it uses real data capture to generate the clothing deformation. The paper also involves multimedia (cs.MM) as it deals with modeling of clothing deformation in motion. The paper involves machine learning (cs.LG) as it uses a Generative Adversarial Network to generate high frequency details. Finally, the paper involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it proposes a data-driven approach to realistic cloth wrinkle generation.
